thread.title: BRIEF-Arena Pharmaceuticals Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Common Stock

title: BRIEF-Arena Pharmaceuticals Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-arena pharmaceuticals announces pricing of public offering of common stock march 21
public offering of common stock reuters

text: March 21, 2018 / 11:12 PM / Updated 41 minutes ago BRIEF-Arena Pharmaceuticals Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Common Stock Reuters Staff March 21 (Reuters) - Arena Pharmaceuticals Inc: * ARENA PHARMACEUTICALS ANNOUNCES PRICING OF PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK * SAYS PUBLIC OFFERING OF 8.50 MILLION COMMON SHARES PRICED AT $41.50PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
